thread.title: Emma Stone just wore almost every 2017 fashion trend on the red carpet
thread.title_full: Emma Stone just wore almost every 2017 fashion trend on the red carpet

author: Stephanie Hallett
title: Emma Stone just wore almost every 2017 fashion trend on the red carpet
text:
Emma Stone just wore almost every 2017 fashion trend on the red carpet Can you believe it? The New Year has only just begun and it’s already almost awards season! And if Emma Stone’s latest red carpet look — which masterfully incorporates nearly every 2017 fashion trend — is any indication, this year is going to be a great one for style.
Wearing a yellow flower-print dress from Gucci’s Spring/Summer 2017 collection at a W magazine event in Los Angeles this week, Emma showed off not one, not two, but three of this year’s top trends: ruffles ; one-shoulder tops; and bright prints.
To sum up: If this is what style in 2017 is going to look like, the fashion team here at HG is going to be very, very happy.
Donato Sardella/Getty Images for W Magazine Isn’t she lovely ?
Emma paired her gorgeous, summery frock with some striking pink metallic heels, also by Gucci, and carried a vibrant pink clutch from Italian designer Tyler Ellis. The overall look was elegant, light-hearted, and reminiscent of her bright yellow ensemble in La La Land. 
A photo posted by La La Land (@lalaland) on Dec 9, 2016 at 6:38pm PST 
Emma wasn’t the only La La Land -er spotted out in Gucci this week. Her dashing co-star, the one and only Ryan Gosling, stepped out at the Palm Springs International Film Festival in a sophisticated one-button Gucci tux from the brand’s Cruise 2017 collection.
Prepare to feel your heart race, because he looks damn fine (as usual).
A photo posted by Gucci (@gucci) on Jan 6, 2017 at 12:36pm PST 
La La Land is currently in theaters nationwide and is expected to clean up at the Oscars this year, so be sure to sneak in a viewing before awards season has officially begun!
